mapper.update: UPDATE housedeals SET apt_dong = #{apt_dong}, floor = #{floor}, deal_year = #{deal_year}, deal_month = #{deal_month}, deal_day = #{deal_day}, exclu_use_ar = #{exclu_use_ar}, deal_amount = #{deal_amount} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT CAST(exclu_use_ar AS CHAR) AS area, ROUND(AVG(REPLACE(deal_amount, ',', '') + 0)) AS avgPrice FROM housedeals WHERE apt_seq = #{aptSeq} GROUP BY exclu_use_ar ORDER BY exclu_use_ar
